aboutUs.dev1: An ambitious developer who strives to grow and improve his skills with each project.
aboutUs.dev2: Talented developer with an eye for detail and a passion for creating quality code.
aboutUs.dev3: A novice developer with a great desire to learn and develop, mastering new technologies.
aboutUs.project: This project required the development of a simplified API application that combines Postman and GraphiQL functionality. It should allow making requests to RESTful and GraphQL APIs, support authentication and authorization, and store request history.
aboutUs.course: The current course is designed to deepen knowledge and acquire practical skills in working with React.
